title: LF Toplaner, d3+ for Top 8 OOL tournament for to OCS.
body:
Team Unknown
Is currently in need of a Quality Toplaner for Top 8 OOL Promotion Tournament. d3+ with up to date meta champ pool. and ready for Scrims for the tourny 26th August.

IGN: Minigorophin
IGN: Elitest Diamond

replies.body: flick me a message ign: pooh have a chat with ya boi
